142 
143 WhiteBalancer::WhiteBalancer()
144 {
145  // Dynamic reconfigure stuff
146  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<white_balancer::WhiteBalanceConfig> server;
147  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<white_balancer::WhiteBalanceConfig>::CallbackType f;
148  f = boost::bind(&WhiteBalancer::callbackRC, this, _1, _2);
149  server.setCallback(f);
150 
151  // Register image messages
152  ros::NodeHandle nh;
153  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
154 
155  ros::Duration(2.0).sleep();
156 
157  std::string ROS_output_topic, ROS_input_topic;
158  if (nh.getParam("/white_balancer/ROS_output_topic", ROS_output_topic)) {
159  WhiteBalancer::pub = it.advertise(ROS_output_topic, 1);
160  } else {
161  ROS_ERROR("No output topic set");
162  exit(2);
163  }
164  image_transport::Subscriber sub;
165  if (nh.getParam("/white_balancer/ROS_input_topic", ROS_input_topic)) {
166  sub = it.subscribe(ROS_input_topic, 1, &WhiteBalancer::imageCallback, this);
167  } else {
168  ROS_ERROR("No input topic set");
169  exit(2);
170  }
171 
172  ros::spin();
173 }
174 
175 void WhiteBalancer::set_temp(int temp)
176 {
177  // Round temp
178  WhiteBalancer::temp = 100 * ((int) temp / 100);
179 }
180 
181 void WhiteBalancer::set_delay(double timestamp_offset)
182 {
183  ros::Duration timestamp_offset_duration = ros::Duration(timestamp_offset);
184  // Check timestamp offset diff
185  if (WhiteBalancer::timestamp_offset != timestamp_offset_duration)
186  {
187  // Set timestamp offset
188  WhiteBalancer::timestamp_offset = timestamp_offset_duration;
189  ROS_INFO("Set new image timestamp delay '%f sec'!", timestamp_offset);
190  }
191 }
192 
193 void WhiteBalancer::imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
194 {
195  try
196  {
197  // Get RGB value for current temperature
198  std::vector <int> white_value = WhiteBalancer::kelvin.at(WhiteBalancer::temp);
199 
200  // Get image
201  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, "bgr8");
202 
203  cv::multiply(cv_ptr->image, cv::Scalar( (float)(255.0/white_value[2]),
204  (float)(255.0/white_value[1]),
205  (float)(255.0/white_value[0])), cv_ptr->image);
206 
207  cv_ptr->header.stamp = cv_ptr->header.stamp + WhiteBalancer::timestamp_offset;
208 
209  // Publish white balanced image
210  WhiteBalancer::pub.publish(cv_ptr->toImageMsg());
211  }
212  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
213  {
214  ROS_ERROR_THROTTLE(60, "Could not convert from '%s' to 'bgr8'.", msg->encoding.c_str());
215  }
216 
217 }
218 
219 void WhiteBalancer::callbackRC(white_balancer::WhiteBalanceConfig &config, uint32_t level) {
220  // Set color temperature
221  WhiteBalancer::set_temp(config.temp);
222  // Set timestamp delay
223  WhiteBalancer::set_delay(config.timestamp_offset);
224 }
225 
226 int main(int argc, char **argv)
227 {
228  // Init
229  ros::init(argc, argv, "white_balancer");
230  WhiteBalancer w;
231 
232  return 0;
233 }
